name: I'm Gonna Break Things with My Roll
name_original: I'm Gonna Break Things with My Roll
description:
A short puzzle platformer created because someone said the sentence that makes up the game's title. Nine levels, each with a hidden coin to find and a special bonus if you find them all and complete the game.

Controls:

ARROWS – move/jump

DOWN – enter doors

R – roll

ESC - return to level select

Art credits:

Monsterboy in Wonder World mockup assets by surt

Explosion by mrbadbr
